name: Knights & Legends: The Lost Chapter Demo
name_original: Knights & Legends: The Lost Chapter Demo
description:
The Lost Chapter, is a dark fantasy story driven prequel to the upcoming role-playing game, Knights & Legends: Dawn of a New Age. The game features all new never before seen content and introduces players to most of the final game's mechanics. Including combat, controls, an original story and rich lore.

More About The Knights & Legends Best Selling Series

Knights & Legends, started as a tabletop role-playing game back in early 2018. By 2019, the game had reached critical acclaim, and became so much more than previously anticipated. Now you get the chance to delve into an alternative vibrant new world for this best selling tabletop role-playing game at no additional cost.
